user-story.i-want: payment sessions to expire automatically after 24 hours
user-story.so-that: auctions reopen quickly when buyers fail to pay.

acceptance-criteria.criterion: **WINDOW CRITICAL**: `payment_window_task.dart` closes sessions past `expiresAt`, expires Stripe checkout objects, and transitions status to `expired` with audit entry. (Implementation Guide §2)

**CLIENT UX**: `payment_window_bloc.dart` drives `payment_window_timer.dart` countdown with drift correction, offline recovery, and WCAG-compliant alerts when <60 minutes remain. (Implementation Guide §2)
**OPERATIONS**: `payment_window_endpoint.dart` allows authorized admins to extend or terminate windows with RBAC and SNS notifications to maker/buyer topics. (Implementation Guide §2)

**OBSERVABILITY**: Metrics `payments.window.expired_count` and `payments.window.extension_count` plus Segment event `payments.checkout.expired` publish with session + auction metadata. (Implementation Guide §2, Monitoring & Analytics)

task.description: Implement `payment_window_service.dart` to persist expiry metadata in Redis (`payment:window:{sessionId}`) and compute remaining time.
Create `payment_window_task.dart` invoked by EventBridge to expire overdue sessions, cancel Stripe checkout, and emit audit log `payment_expired`.
Add `payment_window_endpoint.dart` for admin override (extend/terminate) with RBAC + SNS notifications.
Build `payment_window_bloc.dart` and `payment_window_timer.dart` to stream remaining time, pause/resume offline, and surface a11y announcements when thresholds hit.
Update `payment_checkout_page.dart` to embed timer widget, including maker/admin override entry points.
Ensure `observe_payment_status_use_case.dart` triggers resync on reconnect using `payment_window_service.dart`.

Emit Datadog metrics `payments.window.expired_count`, `payments.window.extension_count`, `payments.window.override_count` via `payments_metrics.dart`; wire to dashboard `docs/analytics/stripe-payme...
Publish Segment event `payments.checkout.expired` with root cause metadata (`reason`, `retryEligible`).

prerequisites.prerequisite: Redis cluster + EventBridge schedule configured via `infrastructure/terraform/payments.tf`.
Notification templates defined for payment expiration alerts (Epic 9 messaging assets).

constraints.constraint: Follow architecture patterns and coding standards

adr.reason: Payment security and PCI compliance requirements.
